    • Content

      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h1>Earn your Income</h1>

<p>To participate in the car race stage of the experiment, you first have to generate income. 
Please follow these instructions carefully.  Your performance in this problem solving task will determine 
how much you will be able to invest and bet in the car race stage of the experiment.</p>

#set( $time = $data.getLong("timerealeffort") / 60000 )
#set( $rp = $data.getRounded('repayout', 2) )

<p>On the following screens, you will be presented with a number of cross-sum problems.  You 
have $time minutes to solve as many problems as possible. For each problem, you need to add up the individual 
digits shown to find the correct answer (e.g. 12345 = 1+2+3+4+5 = 15).
You will get $ $rp for each problem correctly solved.
The problems will get more difficult with each attempt to solve a question.
At any point you can decide to drop out of solving problems, in which case you will get
$ $rp per 20 seconds of the remaining time (but you will have to wait the whole duration 
of this stage of the experiment before moving on to the next stage). </p>

<h2>Example Screen:</h2>
<br>

<p>
Total time passed: 00:00
</p>

<p>
Time passed for this problem: 00:00
<br></p>

<p>
Your earnings so far: $ 0.00 
</p>

<p>
Solve the following cross-sum problem: 12345
</p>


<p>
Solution: <focusinput type='text' name='fakesolution' value='15'>
</p>

#set( $rp = $data.getRounded('repayout', 2) )
<p>
Do you want to stop solving problems, and instead earn $ $rp per 20 seconds of the remaining time?
<br> 
<input type='checkbox' name='fakedropout' value='true'> Yes
<br></p>

<br>

<p>
<input type='submit' name='submit' value='START'>
</p>

<!-- Proper text still outstanding from Innsbruck. -->


#parse("oetinvest/footer.vm")
